bill.summary:
Federal Information Resource to Strengthen Ties with State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2019 or the FIRST State and Local Law Enforcement Act
This bill requires the Office for State and Local Law Enforcement within the Department of Homeland Security to report annually on its activities.
